thread.title_full: 'Enough of the Emails!' Will Help Bernie Sanders Surpass Hillary Clinton in National Polls - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: 'Enough of the Emails!' Will Help Bernie Sanders Surpass Hillary Clinton in National Polls
text: Simply answering questions without being able to dodge contentious issues doesn't account for a win, nor does it make a candidate "presidential," "polished" or poised. The standard in American politics has been set lower than ever before,
